rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0727, 3562, 3892, 4506, 4514}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {NUR1102}

description: This unit provides the opportunity for the student to develop fundamental knowledge, skills and attitudes relevant to the restoration and maintenance of optimal mental health. Students will be expected to assess people with mental health problems and to identify, prioritise and implement appropriate evidence based interventions and management strategies.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
